title: Roasted mushroom and Jerusalem artichoke soup
ingredients: ['1kg Jerusalem artichokes, scrubbed and sliced', '1 large potato, diced', '6 large cloves garlic', '2 tablespoons olive oil, divided', 'sea salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '250g mushrooms, sliced', '2 tablespoons margarine', '1 large onion, diced', '1 teaspoon sea salt', '500ml water', '1.5L vegetable stock', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh sage', '125ml soya milk (optional)']
